item.title: Installing RStudio daily builds (Ubuntu)
item.author: aron.atkins@gmail.com (Aron Atkins)
item.description: The script that I previously published to handle OSX installs has been updated to also handle installing RStudio daily desktop builds on Ubuntu Linux hosts. You need to install either curl or wget in order to use this script. It only understands Ubuntu installation and uses dpkg to perform the install. If run as a non-root user, sudo is used when running dpkg. You may need to follow this script with a apt-get install -f to install RStudio package dependencies (using sudo if appropriate).
